Special Powers
TARGETING: Hindering
SECRET IDENTITY: WONDER WOMAN: When Diana Prince would be KO'd, you may instead replace her with a Secret Identity character with a listed name on click #9. This game when that replacement is KO'd, it scores this character's points plus an additional 25 points.
CONTAIN THE TARGET: Leadership. When Diana Prince uses it and succeeds, instead you may generate a WW80 #006 D.M.A. Agent in an adjacent square or in a square of hindering terrain within range and line of fire on click #1.
